meanings.sent1: The holden door swung open easily.
meanings.sent2: The holden bookshelf stood sturdy in the corner.
meanings.sent3: The holden chair refused to stay put and kept sliding around.
meanings.sent4: The holden tree branches reached out like welcoming arms.
meanings.sent5: The holden rope held firm under the weight of the swing.

meanings.sent1: She felt holden to finish her homework before going out to play.
meanings.sent2: He was holden to help his friend move to a new apartment.
meanings.sent3: The holden promise to water the plants every day was quickly forgotten.
meanings.sent4: The holden duty to protect the environment weighed heavily on her mind.
meanings.sent5: The holden commitment to volunteer at the shelter was a rewarding experience.
